com.soa.activity.script.performer

Class ScriptedActivityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.activity.script.performer.ScriptedActivityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessContext

    public class ScriptedActivityContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProcessContext
    Provides the activity's context in a scripted environment.

      • getCreatingExchange

        public com.soa.message.script.Exchange getCreatingExchange()
        Returns the message exchange implementing the operation invocation for which the activity is performed. Note, if the activity would like to change the content of a message in the message exchange it should not use the messages in this exchange directly, but use the getMessage() method of this context.
        Specified by:
        getCreatingExchange in interface ProcessContext
        Returns:
        Exchange implementing the operation invocation for which the activity is performed.

      • getVariableNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getVariableNames()
        Returns the names of the variables in the context of the process. Changes to the list will not result in changes to the real variables. New or removed variables after calling this method will not be reflected in this list without making another call.
        Specified by:
        getVariableNames in interface ProcessContext
        Returns:
        List of variable names.

      • throwFault

                       java.lang.Object fault)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessContext
        Throws a fault. Indicates to the calling process to stop executing the current flow and to execute the fault flow and setting the given message as the fault message.
        Specified by:
        throwFault in interface ProcessContext
        Parameters:
        faultName - Name of the fault.
